inclusion.criterion: Veterans from the Salem VAMC pulmonary clinics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recent PFT diagnostic of COPD (FEV1/FVC <0.7 and FEV1< 80%)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: any regular participation in structured exercise sessions;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: acute infectious illness in the prior month;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prescription of systemic glucocorticoids or immune-suppressive agents in the prior month and
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: weight above 330 pounds, the limit allowed by the Wii pressure sensor floor mat.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Pulmonary consult recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial due to severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living.
